attributes.action: explain the role of Her Majesty's Government's role in administrating British Cameroons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That by UN resolution 1608 paragraph 5, her Majesty's Government was obliged to assist  Mr John Ngu Foncha in discussing the arrangements for the transfer of sovereignty from Her Majesty to the Republic of Cameroon.
